document.full_text: syrian president bashar al-assad granted citizenship on thursday to kurds in eastern syria, part of attempts to cool resentment over nearly five decades of strict baathist rule and deflect pro-democracy protests.
document.title: syria's assad tries to appease kurds after unrest
lines_and_colors: syrian president bashar al-assad granted citizenship on thursday to kurds in eastern syria, part of attempts to cool resentment over nearly five decades of strict baathist rule and deflect pro-democracy protests.
